name: Hell Warders
description: Hell is at our gates! Rise up as one of the mighty Hell Warders, an ancient order of heroes with unique powers and abilities, to resist the demon hordes head-on. Push back wave after wave of Hell-spawn with an arsenal of weapons, rip apart their fearsome commanders with powerful hero skills, and deploy your army of knights, archers, and...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, ATI Radeon™ HD 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom™ II X3 or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
